page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ANNA
page.content: I get up about quarter to seven get dressed and have my breakfast of rice crispies or coco pops and toast. After I watch television or play the piano. Then I start walking to school with my Mom. When I get to school I usually put the computer on with Jane. Then we do maths, then we have play. After we go on with maths or do copy writing. At 12 o'clock we have our sandwiches and we play until 1 o'clock, then we go swimming. After we do drawing in our book or poetry. Then we have a story and then go home. When I get home I get changed and then play on roller boots with Jill and Jane until 5 o'clock when I have tea. After I get ready for Brownies. I am in the Elves Six and at Brownies we do lots of things. We play games and make things. Then at a quarter past seven we go home.
